import React from "react"; import Image1 from "../../assets/images/barbeque-chicken.jpg"; import { Image } from "../ui"; import s from "./RecipesDetails.module.css"; export default function RecipesDetails() { return (

Barbeque Chicken

Yield: 4 servings

Cook Time: 45 minutes

Ingredients

  1. cup of sugar
  2. 1 tsp of vinegar
  3. 2 tbsp of ketchup
  4. 2 chicken breasts

Instructions

  1. mix the sauce ingredients in a large bowl
  2. add chicken and store in the fridge for at least 1 hour
  3. pour 1 tbsp of olive oil in a pan
  4. add chicken and stir-fry until golden brown
); }
